reviews.text: Upon arrival we were met with courteous and friendly staff who showed us to our room. Our room was a luxury double and we couldnâ€™t have been happier, the bed was so comfortable and I think we have had our best nights sleep in a long time. The restaurant staff were extremely helpful in adapting their 5 course menu to meet with my dietary needs. The food exceeded our expectations and was matched perfectly to wine that would suit. The hotel location is ideal for sightseeing and we would happily book to stay again. Overall, our stay was amazing! Thank you

A huge thank you to Sara for her invaluable help and kindness throughout the booking process, which allowed us to arrive at the Sofitel Roma Villa Borghese with complete peace of mind.

The Junior Suite we stayed in was beautiful: bright, elegantly decorated, and offering a stunning view over Rome. The comfort and thoughtful details made it the perfect place to unwind.

Breakfast was simply exquisite, with a wide selection of fresh, high-quality options. Every morning was a delight, and the attentive, friendly staff provided impeccable service.

Throughout our stay, the hotel team was outstanding, blending professionalism with genuine warmth, always with a smile. We felt cared for at every moment.

Sofitel Roma Villa Borghese is a place where elegance, comfort, and top-notch service come together. Many thanks again to Sara and the entire team for an unforgettable experience. We look forward to returning!

Best part of our stay in Rome!  Rooftop view where we had breakfast was incredible!  We found this hotel, thanks to COSTCO TRAVEL!!!

Food and lodging amenities were excellent!  Everything was spotless clean.  Staff was so friendly and helpful.  I would recommend this hotel 10 times over!!

We loved every minute of our 4 night stay at Sofitel Roma Villa Borghese. The entire staff was very accommodating to us and made our stay nice. The rooms are extremely comfortable - automatic blinds, televisions in every room including the bathroom mirror, and luxurious beds. Great housekeeping services, too - turn down service, daily cleaning, and complete resetting of all the amenities each day. We can't wait to return!

Right next to Villa Borghese and walkable to all events and sites in central Roma. Plenty of dining, bars nearby.

We stayed for 3 nights and everything was perfect. The finer details to make a stay extra special were present everywhere.  Helpful and happy staff , excellent food and drinks , amazing views and atmosphere it the roof top restaurant. Every need was anticipated and provided with as smile.  The rooms are super comfortable , modern and has everything we needed and more. Lots of treats to make you feel like a special customer.   A short walk for the action but next to beautiful parks and a view of St Peters.  No better spot !
